channel.title: After formating my pc my server just crashes
channel.description:
useing easy rsc (single player mod)
unpacked the game and installed the newest java and it just crashes , what am i missing or was the backup i did faulty?

item.title: After formating my pc my server just crashes
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

CodeForFame:

Your problem is using the newest version of Java… MoparClassic is the only source that works with Java 7.

the client loads but the server won’t , yeah i updated java will try old java later

update installing java 6 update 5 fixed the problem not sure why but 7 does not work cheers for the help guys

Read full topic
item.source: After formating my pc my server just crashes
